item.title: Adding items
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

well at this point it’s purely assumptions cause I don’t deal with modeling whatsoever but I would assume you either

  1. don’t have all the models needed
    or
  2. need a model header of some kind
    or maybe even
  3. maybe some part of the int is missing like an inventory value or something.

item.title: Adding items
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

so i tried adding a chaotic crossbow into my server, and i added a chaotic staff and nothing went wrong.
but for some reason, when i spawn chaotic crossbow its invisible and you cant see it, but you can weild it.

this is what i put into my itemdef.java

case 15041: itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 35093;//female itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.modelZoom = 1028; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 249; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 2021; itemDef.modelID = 54331; itemDef.name = "Chaotic Crossbow"; itemDef.anInt188 = -1;//femmale sleeve itemDef.anInt164 = -1;//male sleeve itemDef.description = "beast crossbow".getBytes(); break;

also im using pi

Read full topic
